data.name: Christmas Vacation Pack
data.detailed_description:
Christmas Vacation DLC Pack

Christmas or not, Fishing is above all!
Who cares if megalomaniac Santa is coming this year with his corny little reindeer and passive-aggressive enslaved elves? You’re all grown up, boys and girls! Big enough to get yourself a real present regardless of your behaviour this year...he, he.

While all those holiday cheerdos are running around in their Christmas frenzy, you’re gonna play it hardcore and use the one thing that is actually good about Christmas - vacation time! And that means FISHING. Plain and simple. Right, kids? So here’s the deal. You get a whole bunch of awesome and powerful fishing tackle in this one gift wrapped Christmas Vacation Pack. Don’t be fooled by its lighthearted and warm spirited name. This pack has all the hardcore tricks and goodies a real angler like yourself needs: all 4 exclusive Christmas edition casting and spinning rods, the new and mega powerful Cyclone® baitcasting and HornetSwarm® spinning reels, a sackful of crankbaits and even a full set of all Fishing Planet fireworks to spice up the fun!
If anything, this is just the right present for uplifting your fishing spirit!

Christmas Vacation Pack includes:

2016 CREDITS use the Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses.

25 BAITCOINS use to purchase advanced fishing tackle, available only for Baitcoins.
Spend your Gold wisely!

30-DAY PREMIUM Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and credits earned for every fish you catch!

RODS ‘N REELS Christmas combos for a real fishing vacation!
Rods:
MerryTree 7' 7"
CandyCane 8' 10"
IndigoRudolf 6' 3"
SnowFlake 7' 3"

Reels:
Cyclone 5500
Cyclone 6500
HornetSwarm 5000
HornetSwarm 6000

TERMINAL TACKLE - a selection of tackle that equips you with a festive bundle of crankbaits and lines!

Crankbaits: Crankbait 12 ft., #2/0 (x3); Crankbait 16 ft., #3/0 (x3); Crankbait 23 ft., #3/0 (x3); Crankbait 30 ft., #4/0 (x3).

Lines: Braid 0.18 mm, Braid 0.2 mm, Braid 0.23 mm, Braid 0.28 mm, Mono 0.35 mm, Mono 0.4 mm, Mono 0.45 mm, Mono 0.5 mm.

EQUIPMENT – Some valuable storage items to enjoy your Christmas experience to the fullest!

FishFort M
Rain Cover Jacket
Fantastic Four Rod Case

FIREWORKS
12 Monkeys Demolition Set
Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack
Hellfish Arsonist Kit
Fireshark Epic Rockets

FISHING LICENSES (30 DAYS):
Advanced Oregon License
Advanced Alberta License
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced California License

This pack has all the hardcore tricks and goodies a real angler like yourself needs: all 4 exclusive Christmas edition casting and spinning rods, the new and mega powerful Cyclone® baitcasting and HornetSwarm® spinning reels, a sackful of crankbaits and even a full set of all Fishing Planet fireworks to spice up the fun!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
